data.title: The Devil's Own - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of The Devil's Own with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
52 Metascore

1997

1 hr 47 mins

Drama, Suspense, Action & Adventure

R

Watchlist

Where to Watch

Harrison Ford and Brad Pitt provide the star-power in this fast-paced thriller. An Irish terrorist (Pitt) escapes to New York, living under an assumed name with the family of noble cop Tom O'Meara (Ford). Tom eventually learns the truth about his boarder, but only after a strong bond forms between the two men. Nevertheless, Tom is duty-bound to bring the lad to justice.
